section.name: Introduction
section.p: Congratulations! You have successfully build project documentation with Maven.
HelloWorld's documentation can be found on Loom's homepage.

section.name: About this documentation
section.p: This is just a very, very basic setup for starting a project's documentation.
HelloWorld extends the master maven project file in Loom's base directory. Some Project Infos are generated from that file.
Note the links above and in the menu. They are defined in xdocs/navigation.xml. This file is xdocs/intro.xml and the examples are xdocs/examples.xml.
When you built this documentation you probably used the maven docs target. This custom target is defined in maven.xml and triggers javadoc, xdoc and pdf generation.
Some special properties, here for Javadoc and PDF generation, are defined in project.properties.
The layout of the PDF document is here controlled by xdocs/navigation-pdf.xml.
The Project Reports section is controlled from the reports part of project.xml.
